name: Ganyu (Genshin Impact) - Realistic + Anime - LoRA
description:
Ganyu (Genshin Impact) - Realistic + Anime - LoRA

Making models can be expensive. Do you like what I do? Consider supporting me on Patreon 🅿️ or feel free to buy me a coffee ☕

I know that there are already many Ganyu LoRA's, however I wanted to test a new technique using NeverEnding Dream (NED) as a base for training to basically turn an anime character into a real one. This is not trained on cosplay images but just on about 300 Ganyu fanarts.

It's flexible enough to make her in any style (realistic or anime, with a bit of help from style loras for a more dramatic effect) and any outfit and hairstyle. Please check the examples.

Triggers with ganyu \(genshin impact\) usually at weight 1 but might require tuning based on the model you're using it on (sometimes I used 1.2, sometimes 0.65). Works great on NeverEnding Dream and with Korean/Japanese likeness loras, or on any anime model out there.

Please enjoy and consider supporting me.

How to use LoRA's in auto1111:

  • Update webui (use git pull like here or redownload it)

  • Copy the file to stable-diffusion-webui/models/lora

  • Select your LoRA like in this video

  • Make sure to change the weight according to the instructions (by default it's :1)
